pr_title: Add a mapping for method_30843 in SignBlockEntity

timeline.message: Add a mapping for method_30843 in SignBlockEntity

timeline.bodyText: does this throw an exception if you use an invalid line number (for say -1) or is it just plain array access to the Text lines field on the block entity
timeline.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: It's just a plain array access. method_30843 doesn't validate the argument. If you use -1, you will get ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
replies.author: enbrain

replies.bodyText: I call this true bikeshedding if you ask to document this!
replies.author: liach
